text: @njdotcom Admit protesting leads to coronavirus spikes and not the indoor eating that u blamed and I will wear mask outdoors. Armed wit proof that there is a direct correlation between the two,  mayors in CA, ATL along with governors have already admitted it as much. Your turn

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
